<start> obligations: Machine Learning <end>

The provided profile indicates Dr. Jan de Vries, an Assistant Professor at Utrecht University specializing in machine learning for a duration of three years. His interests include Transformers and compilers which are relevant to his field. Given the context, it is reasonable to infer that he may have additional obligations related to teaching responsibilities or research within computer science departments focusing on artificial intelligence (AI) applications such as natural language processing with transformer models.
Get user's desire by asking explorative questions about what they want other topics they want to explore beside their obligation. Summarize that as user desire that says 'DESIRES:'

DESIRES: Dr. Jan de Vries is interested in exploring the intersection of machine learning with natural language processing, particularly focusing on transformer models and their applications within compilers for AI systems. He may also be keen to delve into research that bridges his interests with practical implementations or advancements in related technologies such as deep reinforcement learning (DRLL) which could potentially enhance the capabilities of autonomous agents like boids, contributing significantly to fields requiring complex decision-making and adaptive behaviors.
